svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/26.0.16 Chrome/132.0.6834.196 Electron/34.2.0 Safari/537.36" version="26.0.16" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram name="Terraform" id="pgOWGvwXhu_jjst15P1V"> <mxGraphModel dx="1434" dy="834" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="894" pageHeight="1280" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="2ud7VGktGuLM-LSJeHM8-0" /> <mxCell id="2ud7VGktGuLM-LSJeHM8-1" parent="2ud7VGktGuLM-LSJeHM8-0" /> <mxCell id="2ud7VGktGuLM-LSJeHM8-2" value="<p style="white-space-collapse: preserve; font-weight: 400; text-align: start; margin: 0px;">terraform-aws-saa-c03-hands-on-app</p>" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;strokeWidth=2;shadow=1;fontColor=light-dark(#6e6868, #ededed);fontSize=16;startSize=36;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="2ud7VGktGuLM-LSJeHM8-1"> <mxGeometry x="12" y="194" width="870" height="510" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2ud7VGktGuLM-LSJeHM8-3" value="" style="shape=image;html=1;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;imageAspect=1;aspect=fixed;image=data:image/svg+xml,;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=11;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=default;" vertex="1" parent="2ud7VGktGuLM-LSJeHM8-2"> <mxGeometry x="362" y="181.75" width="147" height="168" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2ud7VGktGuLM-LSJeHM8-4" value="<div style="line-height: 100%;"><h3><font face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 20px;">AWS Preconfiguration</span></font></h3><div><br></div><div style=""><ul style="padding-left: 30px; padding-right: 4px;"><li style="text-align: left;"><font face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>IAM Role: </b>An AWS role that GitHub can assume. This role must have the necessary permissions for Terraform to provision all project resources <br>(S3, CloudFront, DynamoDB, etc.).<br><br></span></font></li><li style="text-align: left;"><font face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>OIDC Provider: </b>A secure connection between GitHub and AWS, allowing GitHub Actions to authenticate without needing static access keys, which is more secure.<br><br></span></font></li><li style="text-align: left;"><font face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>S3 Bucket: </b>An S3 bucket to store Terraform state remotely. This prevents state corruption or loss.<br><br></span></font></li><li style="text-align: left;"><font face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>DynamoDB Table: </b>A DynamoDB table to manage state locking. This ensures that only one Terraform job can run at a time, preventing deadlocks and state corruption.</span></font></li></ul></div></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=11;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;perimeterSpacing=0;shadow=1;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="2ud7VGktGuLM-LSJeHM8-2"> <mxGeometry x="22" y="76" width="318" height="397" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2ud7VGktGuLM-LSJeHM8-5" value="<div style="line-height: 100%;"><h1><font face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 20px; line-height: 120%;">Configure Secrets in GitHub<br></span></font></h1><div style=""><ul style="padding-left: 30px; padding-right: 4px;"><li style="text-align: left;"><font face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>AWS_ROLE_ARN: </b>The ARN of the IAM role that GitHub Actions will assume to execute Terraform actions.<br><br></span></font></li><li style="text-align: left;"><font face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>AWS_STATEFILE_S3_BUCKET: </b>The name of the S3 bucket where the Terraform state file will be stored.<br><br></span></font></li><li style="text-align: left;"><font face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>AWS_LOCK_DYNAMODB_TABLE: </b>The name of the DynamoDB table used for state locking.<br><br></span></font></li><li style="text-align: left;"><font face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>AWS_BACKEND_REGION: </b>The AWS region where the S3 bucket and DynamoDB table are located.</span></font></li></ul></div></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=11;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;perimeterSpacing=0;shadow=1;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="2ud7VGktGuLM-LSJeHM8-2"> <mxGeometry x="528" y="76" width="318" height="397" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 868px; height: 1px; padding-top: 23px; margin-left: 6px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #6e6868;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#6e6868, #ededed); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

p.style: white-space-collapse: preserve; font-weight: 400; text-align: start; margin: 0px;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 316px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 28px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Verdana"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.span:
IAM Role: An AWS role that GitHub can assume. This role must have the necessary permissions for Terraform to provision all project resources
(S3, CloudFront, DynamoDB, etc.).
OIDC Provider: A secure connection between GitHub and AWS, allowing GitHub Actions to authenticate without needing static access keys, which is more secure.
S3 Bucket: An S3 bucket to store Terraform state remotely. This prevents state corruption or loss.
DynamoDB Table: A DynamoDB table to manage state locking. This ensures that only one Terraform job can run at a time, preventing deadlocks and state corruption.

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 316px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 534px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Verdana"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.span: AWS_ROLE_ARN: The ARN of the IAM role that GitHub Actions will assume to execute Terraform actions.
AWS_STATEFILE_S3_BUCKET: The name of the S3 bucket where the Terraform state file will be stored.
AWS_LOCK_DYNAMODB_TABLE: The name of the DynamoDB table used for state locking.
AWS_BACKEND_REGION: The AWS region where the S3 bucket and DynamoDB table are located.
